description.raw:
The goal is for it to compile and load the plugins, there are still problems being solved with the 3D scene and the time panel is just a couple of buttons I threw there. This will all change!

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1895266187-gzquick.png)
---

Added the `TmpIface` class to put some ign-transport services and topics which interact with the GUI. I created this class because it's not clear to me yet where these services should go in the backend.

---

This PR requires [this ign-gui PR](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/134/gz11-menu-configuration/diff#chg-examples/standalone/custom_drawer/custom_drawer.cc).

The drawer menu now provides some options which call backend services, and others which perform default ign-gui actions:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/2535240202-customdrawer.png)
description.html:
The goal is for it to compile and load the plugins, there are still problems being solved with the 3D scene and the time panel is just a couple of buttons I threw there. This will all change!

Added the TmpIface class to put some ign-transport services and topics which interact with the GUI. I created this class because it's not clear to me yet where these services should go in the backend.

This PR requires this ign-gui PR.

The drawer menu now provides some options which call backend services, and others which perform default ign-gui actions:
